### Example `.ghdocs.json` with all possible values

```json
{
  "owner": "bitflight-devops",
  "repo": "github-action-readme-generator",
  "title_prefix": "GitHub Action: ",
  "paths": {
    "action": "action.yml",
    "readme": "README.md"
  },
  "show_logo": true,
  "versioning": {
    "enabled": true,
    "prefix": "v"
  }
}
```
